CustomField.formula: MAX( 0, IF( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Renewal", ACV__c - Original_ACV__c, ACV__c ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This formula is used to calculate "New Money" depending on whether the Opportunity is a Renewal or not. For renewals, it only counts the growth (if there is any); for other types, it uses the full ACV.
CustomField.label: New Money
